quotes.quote: You must give some time to your fellow men. Even if it's a little thing, do something for others - something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The great art of giving consists in this: the gift should cost very little and yet be greatly coveted, so that it may be the more highly appreciated.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The excellence of a gift lies in its appropriateness rather than in its value.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: A compliment is a gift, not to be thrown away carelessly, unless you want to hurt the giver.
quotes.author: Eleanor Hamilton

quotes.quote: There is no benefit in the gifts of a bad man.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: One must be poor to know the luxury of giving.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Give what you have. To someone, it may be better than you dare to think.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Make all you can, save all you can, give all you can.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Do give books - religious or otherwise - for Christmas. They're never fattening, seldom sinful, and permanently personal.
quotes.author: Lenore Hershey

quotes.quote: You try to give away what you want yourself.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: If we have the opportunity to be generous with our hearts, ourselves, we have no idea of the depth and breadth of love's reach.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: If you want to see what children can do, you must stop giving them things.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: What a child doesn't receive he can seldom later give.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: Gifts allow us to demonstrate exactly how little we know about a person. And nothing pisses a person off more than being shoved into the wrong pigeonhole.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A gift in season is a double favor to the needy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: He doubly benefits the needy who gives quickly.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The spirit in which a thing is given determines that in which the debt is acknowledged; it's the intention, not the face-value of the gift, that's weighed.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Purchase not friends by gifts; when thou ceasest to give, such will cease to love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Rich gifts wax poor when givers prove unkind.
